overview:
At Mr. Chewy, he is responsible for all Supply Chain Operations with emphasis on inventory management as well as world class service to our customers (on time and quantity fill). This includes the full management of our suppliers, inventory, distribution centers as well as the timeliness of all outbound orders to our customers. In addition, he is also responsible for negotiating pricing with our suppliers and improving the overall efficiency of our total Operations.

With over 8 years of experience in Supply Chain Operations and 2 years in Sales and Marketing, Ken brings a wealth of experience to MrChewy.com. The majority of his experience comes from Newell Rubbermaid, where he held forecasting and planning roles for several divisions in varying industries: big box retailers, industrial channels, and OEM businesses. He also held 2 management positions where he led the Sales and Operations Plan (S&OP) for 3 businesses as well as full Supply Chain Operations for Newell Rubbermaid’s OEM business, Ashland Hardware.

degrees.degree_type: Bachelor of Science in Business Administration
degrees.subject: Marketing
